trans-unit.source: Represents either an entity, entity stub or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 代表實體、 實體虛設常式或關聯性。

trans-unit.source: No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
trans-unit.target: 這裡沒有內容將會更新。請不要在這裡新增資料。

trans-unit.source: Accepts the current values as original values.
trans-unit.target: 接受目前的值做為原始值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current values of the entry to match the property values of a supplied object.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前的值，以符合提供之物件的屬性值的項目。

trans-unit.source: The detached object that has updated values to apply to the object.
trans-unit.target: 中斷連結的物件更新將套用至物件的值。

trans-unit.source: `currentEntity` can also be the object’s entity key.
trans-unit.target: `currentEntity`也可以是物件的實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Sets the original values of the entry to match the property values of a supplied object.
trans-unit.target: 設定以符合提供之物件的屬性值的項目原始值。

trans-unit.source: The detached object that has original values to apply to the object.
trans-unit.target: 中斷連結的物件，其中包含要套用至物件的原始值。

trans-unit.source: `originalEntity` can also be the object’s entity key.
trans-unit.target: `originalEntity`也可以是物件的實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Changes state of the entry to the specified <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 項目狀態變更為指定<xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> value to set for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State*> property of the entry.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"> </xref>值以設定<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State*>屬性的項目。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry.State*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values of the object or relationship associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的屬性值的物件或關聯性與此相關聯<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord"></xref> that contains the current values of the object or relationship associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord"> </xref> ，其中包含的物件或關聯性與此相關聯的目前值<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Marks an entity as deleted.
trans-unit.target: 將實體標記為已刪除。

trans-unit.source: Gets the entity object.
trans-unit.target: 取得實體物件。

trans-unit.source: The entity object.
trans-unit.target: 實體物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the entity key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The entity key.
trans-unit.target: 實體索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase"></xref> for the object or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase"></xref>物件或關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase"></xref> for the object or relationship.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase"> </xref>物件或關聯性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of an object’s properties that have changed since the last time <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges*> was called.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的上一次之後已變更物件的屬性名稱<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges*>呼叫。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.SaveChanges*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of names as string.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>當做字串之名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updatable version of original values of the object associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此相關聯之物件的原始值的可更新的版本<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The updatable original values of object data.
trans-unit.target: 物件資料的可更新的原始值。

trans-unit.source: Uses DetectChanges to determine whether or not the current value of the property with the given name is different from its original value.
trans-unit.target: 會使用 DetectChanges 判斷具有指定名稱屬性的目前值為其原始值不同。

trans-unit.source: Note that this may be different from the property being marked as modified since a property which has not changed can still be marked as modified.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這可能會被標示為已修改，因為尚未變更的屬性仍然會標示為已修改的屬性不同。

trans-unit.source: For complex properties, a new instance of the complex object which has all the same property values as the original instance is not considered to be different by this method.
trans-unit.target: 為複雜的屬性，含有與原始執行個體的屬性值完全相同的複雜物件的新執行個體是不被視為不同由這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property has changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性已變更。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref> represents a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>代表關聯性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref> represents a relationship; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>代表關聯性，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the read-only version of original values of the object or relationship.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件或關聯性的原始值的唯讀版本。

trans-unit.source: The read-only version of original values of the relationship set entry or entity.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性的原始值的唯讀版本設定項目或實體。

trans-unit.source: Rejects any changes made to the property with the given name since the property was last loaded, attached, saved, or changes were accepted.
trans-unit.target: 會拒絕具有指定名稱屬性的屬性上一次已載入、 附加、 儲存，或接受變更之後所做的變更。

trans-unit.source: The orginal value of the property is stored and the property will no longer be marked as modified.
trans-unit.target: 儲存屬性的原始值和屬性將不再標示為已修改。

trans-unit.source: If the result is that no properties of the entity are marked as modified, then the entity will be marked as Unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果是實體的任何屬性會標示為已修改，實體將會不標示為未變更。

trans-unit.source: Changes to properties can only rejected for entities that are in the Modified or Unchanged state.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕實體處於已修改] 或 [未變更狀態只能變更的內容。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method for entities in other states (Added, Deleted, or Detached) will result in an exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 其他狀態 （已加入、 刪除或 Detached） 中的實體呼叫這個方法會導致擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Rejecting changes to properties of an Unchanged entity or unchanged properties of a Modifed is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕未變更實體的屬性或修改的不變的屬性變更為無作業。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to change.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref> instance for the object represented by entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref>項目所表示之物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the object or relationship to modify.
trans-unit.target: 設定物件或修改的關聯性的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified property as modified.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的屬性標示為已修改。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態的<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 狀態<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a complex property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知複雜屬性已經變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the top-level object property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 正在變更的最上層物件屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The complex object that contains the property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 包含已變更之屬性的複雜物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the complex object that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 正在變更的複雜物件上的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a complex property has a pending change.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知複雜屬性具有暫止的變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the complex property.
trans-unit.target: 複雜屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The complex object that contains the property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 包含已變更之屬性的複雜物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the complex object that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 正在變更的複雜物件上的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知屬性已經變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更之實體屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the state manager that a property has a pending change.
trans-unit.target: 向狀態管理員通知屬性具有暫止的變更。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity property that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 正在變更之實體屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry"></xref>.
